answerText: Sir Gareth of Orkney[10] Sir Gareth was killed by Lancelot while the latter was trying to rescue this queen, with whom Lancelot was carrying on a torrid love affair.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 11 | 16 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: He was given the name "Beaumains" because of his beautiful hands. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Arthurian hero who was the son of King Lot of Orkney and Morgause. This knight slew the Red Knight of the Red Lands, though he himself would die by Lancelot's hand.
